title: Sum of Numbers Until N
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the concept of summing all the numbers between 1 and a given number n. We will be using the formula (n * (n + 1)) / 2 to calculate the sum of numbers. Through this lab, you will gain a better understanding of how to solve mathematical problems using programming.

meta.title: Mastering the Sum of Numbers Until N
meta.description: Learn to calculate the sum of numbers between 1 and a given number using a simple formula.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, mathematical problem solving, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, coding practice, sum of numbers, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
